Verses: 1 avar Ezhaam Muththiraiyai Udaiththapodhu, Paralogaththil Erakkuraiya Araimanineramalavum Amaidhal Undaayitru.
2 pinbu, Dhevanukkumunbaaga Nirkira Ezhu Thoodhargalaiyung Kanden, Avargalukku Ezhu Ekkaalangal Kodukkappattadhu.

3 veroru Thoodhanum Vandhu, Thoobangaattum Porkalasaththaip Pidiththup Balipeedaththin Padiyile Nindraan; Singaasanaththirkumunbaaga Irundha Porpeedaththinmel Sagala Parisuththavaangaludaiya Jebangalodum Seluththumbadi Migundha Thoobavarkkam Avanukkuk Kodukkappattadhu.
4 appadiye Parisuththavaangaludaiya Jebangalodum Seluththappatta Thoobavarkkaththin Pugaiyaanadhu Thoodhanudaiya Kaiyilirundhu Dhevanukkumunbaaga Ezhumbitru.

5 pinbu, Andhath Thoodhan Thoobakalasaththai Eduththu, Adhaip Balipeedaththu Neruppinaal Nirappi, Boomiyile Kottinaan; Udane Saththangalum, Idimuzhakkangalum, Minnalgalum, Boomiyadhirchchiyum Undaayina.
6 appozhudhu, Ezhu Ekkaalangalaiyudaiya Ezhu Thoodhargal Ekkaalam Oodhugiradharkuth Thangalai Aayaththappaduththinaargal.

7 mudhalaam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Iraththangalandha Kalmazhaiyum Akkiniyum Undaagi, Boomiyile Kottappattadhu; Adhinaal Marangalil Moondrilorupangu Vendhupoyitru, Pasumpullellaam Erindhupoyitru.
8 irandaam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Akkiniyaal Erigira Periya Malaipondradhondru Samuththiraththile Podappattadhu. Adhinaal Samuththiraththil Moondrilorupangu Iraththamaayitru.
9 samuththiraththilirundha Jeevanulla Sirushtigalil Moondrilorupangu Seththuppoyitru; Kappalgalil Moondrilorupangu Sedhamaayitru.

10 moondraam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Oru Periya Natchaththiram Theevattiyaippola Erindhu, Vaanaththilirundhu Vizhundhadhu; Adhu Aarugalil Moondrilorupanginmelum, Neerutrugalinmelum Vizhundhadhu.
11 andha Natchaththiraththirku Ettiyendru Peyar; Adhinaal Thanneeril Moondrilorupangu Ettiyaippolak Kasappaayitru; Ippadik Kasappaana Thanneerinaal Manusharil Anegar Seththaargal.

12 naangaam Thoodhan Ekkaalam Oodhinaan; Appozhudhu Sooriyanil Moondriloru Pangum, Sandhiranil Moondrilorupangum, Natchaththirangalil Moondrilorupangum Sedhappattadhu, Avatravatril Moondrilorupangu Iruladaindhadhu; Pagalilum Moondrilorupangu Piragaasamillaamarpoyitru, Iravilum Appadiyeyaayitru.

13 pinbu, Oru Thoodhan Vaanaththin Maththiyile Parandhuvarakkanden; Avan Magaa Saththamittu: Ini Ekkaalam Oodhappogira Matra Moondru Thoodharudaiya Ekkaala Saththangalinaal Boomiyil Kudiyirukkiravargalukku Aiyo, Aiyo, Aiyo (aapaththuvarum) Endru Sollakketten.
